QuestData.Title: Sons of Sethe
QuestData.Description: Many years have passed since anyone has been in contact with Anzu. He faded away, as Terokk did, to take refuge in the shadows.$B$BIf we are to coax him back, we should make an offering.$B$BSethe took the sky from us all - it seems fitting to take the wings of his children.
QuestData.CompletionText: <A large bowl awaits an offering for the raven god.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Heaping the wings into the bowl, you hear a faint rustling of feathers from somewhere overhead.>
